I like being ab...Full Review(Update: July 2018) Now that mood has made made many improvements to the user interface and customization options over the past couple years, I love it! To start, when they say "ad free", they mean it. It's ironic because Mood is one of the few apps that I actually want to pay for.   I like being able to customize colors (for each contact) and the additional options for notifications and and delivery status have set Mood a notch above most other SMS apps.
